panels.description: Display CPU usage above 75% for more than 5 consecutive minutes.

panels.description: Display disk write request IOPS above tier threshold. Thresholds are dynamic per tier. If it is on here, it is over its threshold!

panels.description: Display network receive usage in gigabytes if greater than 20GB in a 30 minute consecutive period.

panels.description: Display network transmit usage in gigabytes if greater than 20GB in a 30 minute consecutive period.
panels.title: Network TX Usage (GB)

panels.description: Display network receive throughput if greater than 125Mbit/s and transfer total is greater than 20 gigabytes in 30 consecutive minutes.
panels.title: Network RX Throughput

panels.description: Display network transmit throughput if greater than 125Mbit/s and transfer total is greater than 20 gigabytes in 30 consecutive minutes.
panels.title: Network TX Throughput

panels.description: Display network receive packets per second above 10000/pps if consecutive for more than 1 minute.

panels.title: Network TX Packets PPS
